product_name: Delta Cycle Donatello 2-Bike Storage Rack - Special Buy
long_description: The Delta Cycles Donatello 2-Bike Storage Rack combines superb strength with a simple design-no bolting or attachment necessary, you just lean it against the wall. Constructed with silver powder-coated steel tubing, this bike storage rack simply rests against the wall and relies on gravity to stabilize the anchoring legs. Independent adjustable arms accommodate any bike style. Rubber bumpers protect wall and floor. Easy to assemble, tools included. Special buy.
short_description: The Delta Cycles Donatello 2-Bike Storage Rack combines superb strength with a simple design-no bolting or attachment necessary, you just lean it against the wall.
